verses.roman:
ye kahe,--caitanya-mahimā mora gocara haya'
se jānuka, mora punaḥ ei ta' niścaya

synonyms: ye kahe—whoever says; caitanya-mahimā—the glories of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mora gocara—known to me; haya—are; se jānuka—he may know; mora—of me; punaḥ—again; ei ta' niścaya—this is the decision;
translation: "One may say that he understands the glories of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. He may know whatever he may know, but as far as I am concerned, this is my conclusion.
